mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.MENU_PERMS FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.MENU_ID = rm.MENU_ID LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID WHERE ur.USER_ID = #{userId} AND m.MENU_PERMS IS NOT NULL AND m.MENU_PERMS != '' AND m.VALI_FLAG = '1' AND m.STAS_FLAG = '1'

SELECT u.*, o.ORG_NAME as orgName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_org o ON u.ORG_ID = o.ORG_ID WHERE u.VALI_FLAG = '1'
AND u.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userName}, '%')
AND u.REAL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.realName}, '%')
AND u.MOBILE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.mobile}, '%')
AND u.ORG_ID = #{user.orgId}
AND u.STAS_FLAG = #{user.stasFlag}
ORDER BY u.CRTE_TIME DESC
